sub_title: Lead of strategic partnership B2B / B2C & CRM, Business Development & Customer success
summary:
*maternity leave- in case of a remote position, please feel free to contact me*

I am stakeholder-focused and ensure accuracy and professionalism in all business interactions. Furthermore, I embody a proactive solution-oriented approach, strong interpersonal skills, and an eye for detail/quality that positions me as an equally strong team member or independent worker. 

Furthermore, I am a professional with a Master’s degree in Economics & Tourism Management and extensive knowledge of the European market. My management experience centers on Tourism Industry, Marketing, Supply Chain & Logistics with a focus on high-touch client care and personalized B2B & B2C sales.

✔ Centers of my interest: 
International company: E-commerce, Travel&Hospitality, Tech, Supply chain&Logistics, Non-profit org. 
☞ Positions:  Procurement, TL, Account Manager, Renewals, Fraud Prevention, Partner Support&Sales, Marketing, Internal/External Audit...etc

☞Feel free to contact me (mariepavlicova20@gmail.com) in case you may have a suitable position. Thank you.ღ

projects.title: Commission Avoidance Project
projects.description: The objective of this project is to assist Partner Behavior Team in analyzing the unwanted behaviors of Booking.com's accommodation partners and guests. Through checks, data collections and fraud investigations, We are able to evaluate and analyze patterns which might add insights in creating procedures and guidelines to prevent fraudulent behavior of properties.

profile_positions.description:
• Project Manager; Implement and improve new processes and Ad Hoc projects to concentrate on strategic goals and quality ( data protection ) 
• Focus on expanding carrier network (CRM) : manage internal & external relationships with stakeholders and support in-house account managers. 
• Promoting digitalization and evaluating the feedback and further insights.
• Proactive in Procurement Tender initiatives and long-term committed freight business to create positive revenue long-range, Coupa Software
• Identify and communicate risks and opportunities with a strong sense of urgency to meet deadlines 
• Responsible for Team contests and overall employee engagement/ KPI 
• Mentor, shadow, Lead & support Team members with day-to-day needs, as well as new employees for a smooth onboarding.

→ Achievements;
•Extra Leading Project; Customs initiative, CoyoteGOprojects, Lead Generation, Digitalization, Ad Hoc assignments (Market Research) which has positive impact for business and internal processes. 
• Promotion of Coyote online portal was higher for more than 23%, Login success rate increased by 20%, and active usage was approx. 15% higher MoM
profile_positions.title: Team Lead EU, Strategic Solution

profile_positions.description:
• Build up and Lead Carrier lead generation initiative.
• Tailored solutions for our key carrier partners as well as a set new quality target for the Conference Teams. 
• Create process and standard procedures to add and maintain carrier files in an internal database. 
• Driven, Execute, and establish transformed internal clean-up initiative (Carrier files in Europe) andcreate a reliable search tool for all internal stakeholders. 

• The highest visibility on preferred lanes(TradeLanes) in EU as well as on carrier business needs 
• Identify potential strategic key partners, especially for onboarding new projects to smoothly target and procure Carrier interest. 
• Proactively build long-term Carrier relationships with contracts for Committed Freight services generated a positive Gross Margin. 
• Internal and external visibility for New onboarding and actively procure capacity or renew cooperation's. 
• Mentor & Train new Carrier account managers and New Coyote's Hires.
• Close Project collaboration with Internal Stakeholders; Carrier Sales & Operation, Service & CFS Team, BI Software development, Carrier Check & Compliance, Marketing, and Procurement Team

→ Achievements;
• Awards; Most Valuable Person (MVP), Q2/Q3 2020 for whole Europe, Projects; lead generation & clean-up initiatives
• Project manager for onboarding new business, which creates 15% success rate. 
• Load board management, assign & delegate responsibilities within the team.
• Lead, train and proactively promote online platform, increase log in success rate by 35%

•      Build up positive internal and external relationships.
•      Support proactively Involved stakeholders: Operations, Pricing team, Sales team, BDM, Carrier 
        Check, Service, and CFS Team
•      Assist with coaching, training, and developing Carrier Sales Reps within the team.

→ Key Accomplishments;
•	08/2019 part of TOP 20 successful employees in Coyote Europe based on productivity/GM.
•	2019 Recognized as a Valuable employee (MVP) nominated by Conference Manager
•      Mentor Program for New colleagues
•	Successfully closed Long Term Tender contracts.
•	Build up a diverse portfolio (+1.000 NEW carriers) that brought Coyote Log. a considerable amount of Gross Margin & Growth

profile_positions.description:
•	Main contact for a new and existing business partner’s worldwide. 
•	Actively contacting properties in the different statuses of the sign-up. Effectively cooperate with business partners and hotels as required and create best practices in order to promote Booking.com
•	Conducted verifying the accuracy of property information. 
•	Training of the stakeholders on internal policies&procedures, functionality and quality maintenance of the systems.
•	Cooperation with involved departments, teams and local offices.
•	Managed and Coordination of email correspondence from PS Department. 
•	Monitor of the proper control process.
•	Extra projects: Facilitated and assisted Behavior Department and Credit Control in fraud prevention and checking audits.
→	Key Accomplishments: I developed a portfolio of approximately more then 800 properties across 6 months, all of which were maintained openly bookable and exceeded quarterly targets and team averages. I gained strong business communication and persuasion skills through extensive sales contact with properties and support for Local offices, particularly within CZ/SK/PL/HU/RU..etc. 
Content Supervision – responsible for successful verification of property information and ensuring planning was maintained on-time and on-budget.
Fraud – Regularly conducted detailed fraud investigations to combat fraudulent charging activity and protect customers and vendors. Developed strong analytical skills&MS office skills, with a focus on Excel. Created and facilitated workshops to improve internal guidelines, controls, and implement process improvements, based on stakeholder feedback.

company.name: International Food Fair Festival, Den Haag, Netherlands

volunteer_experiences.description:
International Food Fair Festival is about food from different countries. Especially we prepared own delicious national specialties.
The proceeds of the Food Fair will be donated to a number of charitable organizations that are active in the world. Such as agriculture ventures, construction, support for women, street children education and rehabilitation of the homeless.
